name: Dangerous Dave in the Deserted Pirate's Hideout
name_original: Dangerous Dave in the Deserted Pirate's Hideout
description:
Dangerous Dave in the Deserted Pirate's Hideout is an arcade game developed by Alfonso Romero. It came out on 31-10-2015. It was published by Alfonso Romero. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
Dangerous Dave in the Deserted Pirate's Hideout is available on iOS.
